Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! About Products - Pocket watches under our private brand "Carrie Hughes" make superb birthday or Christmas gifts. - They are also ideal for corporate gifts or for anyone looking for cool things to buy. - This is an example of a pocket watch with a luminous dial. - High quality mechanical wind up pocket watch. Technical specifications - Features: luminous dial - Product number: CHPW20 - Display: Analogue - Movement: Mechanical Hand-wind - Case material: Metal - Case (Length/Width/Height): 47 / 47 / 15 mm - Band Materialï¼sMetal Chain - Band widthï¼s5 millimeters - Band (Length/Width): 370 / 5 mm - Calendar function: no - Water-Resistance (bar/ATM): no Package included: Mechanical Pocket watch with chain * 1 - Carrie Hughes Brand Gift box * 1. How use mechanical watch? -1.When you first wear, turn the pocket watch button (clockwise) until it is full (15-20 hands). -2. Gently pull up the button, turn the adjustment time, and then press the button. -3. If you are still standing for a long time, please gently swing several times, winding a few laps. At this point it will work properly. -4. If you feel the winding is tight, please immediately stop spinning, so as not to damage the movement.
